OS/2

version

OS/2 table version should be 4.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

post

format

If not CFF, post table format should be 2.

Post table format is 3.0 but should be 2 (except for CJK fonts). Please investigate.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/post

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name, Bold Italic

MS NID 2

MS ID 2 should be 'Bold Italic' and OS2.fsSelection.bold = True and head.macStyle.bold = True and OS2.fsSelection.regular = False.

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'

head.macStyle.bold is 'True'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'

hmtx/CFF

Advance width

Advance width of hmtx and CFF table should be the same (tolerance 2 units).

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Info

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Individual Glyphs

Individual Glyphs

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

post

Check if tables are present: 'post' table if ttf, 'CFF ' table if otf.

CANNOT check double NULL names. Format 3.0 post table.

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

cmap

uni200B

Check ZERO WIDTH SPACE

Missing uni200B in cmap table.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 98

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
569 = 569

Info

Can not check, because no uni2009 in this font.

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

'U+0123' (uni0123) (ID 219)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

Index 1 = '0'.
'U+0300' (uni0300) (ID 289) = '0'.
'U+0301' (uni0301) (ID 290) = '0'.
'U+0303' (uni0303) (ID 291) = '0'.
'U+0309' (uni0309) (ID 292) = '0'.
'U+0323' (uni0323) (ID 293) = '0'.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0020

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0020.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0x2122

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0x2122.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

italic flag

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is an 'Oblique' entry.

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

useTypoMetrics

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

cmap

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni0000 is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

-/-

TRK

Obsolete language tag 'TUR' should be TRK.

OK: No language tag 'TUR' in any table.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'GillSansNova-Light'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Light'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Gill Sans Nova'

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'GillSansNova-LightItalic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mac NID 6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'LightItalic'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '12'
'GillSansNova'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Demi, X, Semi, Dm, Ex, Extra, Sm, Ultra'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Gill Sans Nova'

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '12'
'GillSansNova'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '

Pass

MS is: 'Gill Sans Nova'

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'
MS is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'

Pass

Error

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '14'
'Gill Sans Nova'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Demi, X, Semi, Dm, Ex, Extra, Sm, Ultra'

Pass

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Gill Sans Nova'

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Gill Sans Nova Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'GillSansNova-Italic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Italic (GillSansItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Gill Sans Nova Bold' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Demi, X, Semi, Dm, Ex, Extra, Sm, Ultra'

'Gill Sans Nova Bold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'GillSansNova-Bold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '14'
'Gill Sans Nova'

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

name

Windows NID 17 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 17, Typographic Subfamily Name' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Gill Sans Nova'

Mac NID 1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

'Gill Sans Nova'

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '23'
'GillSansNova-BoldItalic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '25'
'Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold'

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word 'Bold' used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications. Style linking and/or font embedding for MS Word might not work.

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

'Bold' at the end of NID 1 causes cross platfrom issues.

It looks like you want to have a 'stand-alone'-font without any style linking, because NID 2 is 'Regular' and NID 1 has the word 'Bold' at the end 'Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold'.
This cause issues in PowerPoint, when you create a PowerPoint presentation on your Mac and you want to open it on a Windows machine. The font might be displayed twice in the font selection menu of MS PowerPoint for Windows + cross platform compatiblity does not work. You may want to consider to replace 'Bold' by 'Bd'. It should work then. (Customer A&E May 2019)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1

Entry: 'Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold'
The keyword 'Ultra' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Demi, X, Semi, Dm, Ex, Extra, Sm, Ultra'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold'

Pass

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'GillSansNova-UltraBold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-UltraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-UltraBold', Everything looks good.

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6

Entry: 'GillSansNova-UltraBold'
The keyword 'Ultra' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'UltraBold'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Ultra Bold' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name/OS/2

MS NID 16

Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Gill Sans Nova'

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

Entry: 'Ultra Bold'
The keyword 'Ultra' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 17 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Should be camel case Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Check style extentions Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Demi, X, Semi, Dm, Ex, Extra, Sm, Ultra'

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

GPOS

-/-

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

Font does not have GPOS table/kerning. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

GPOS

-/-

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

Font does not have GPOS table/kerning. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Error

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1868) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 2054
hhea.descent: -612
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

OS2.sTypoDescender: -471
OS2.sTypoLineGap: 0

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1850) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

hhea.ascent: 2054
hhea.descent: -612
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

Gill Sans Nova Regular (GillSansNova.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1868) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Monotype standard for gasp table.

gasp subtable '8' is
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'
equal to MT standard
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'

Pass

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold (GillSansBoNova.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Monotype standard for gasp table.

gasp subtable '8' is
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'
equal to MT standard
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Bold Italic (GillSansBoItNova.ttf)

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

PostScript names

PostScript names

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Regular (GillSansLightNova.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info

Gill Sans Nova Light Italic (GillSansLightItNova.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.
